home.griefDescription:

which affect our constituents or ourselves.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Welcome to MindBridge - your mental health companion. We are dedicated to providing support and resources for mental wellness.

work.title: Work With Us
work.description: Join our mission to improve mental health and make a difference in people's lives.

events.title: Events
events.description: Join us for mental health awareness events and community gatherings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with us for support, questions, or feedback.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Begin your mental health journey with MindBridge today.
